channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 我们已经提前看到了 Z 世代管理的工作场所的模样。准备好迎接许多变化吧。
item.description:
We’re getting an early glimpse at what Gen Z-run workplaces will look like. Prepare for a lot of changes. https://t.co/RxF6en7SIB https://t.co/RxF6en7SIB

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）出席了今年的金球奖颁奖典礼，为她的电影 "Eras Tour "获得提名助威，引起了热议。但有些斯威夫特人可能会失望地发现，这部演唱会电影并未获得今年奥斯卡奖的提名。
item.description:
Taylor Swift generated buzz when she attended this year’s Golden Globes to support her “Eras Tour” film’s nomination.

But some Swifties may have been disappointed to learn that the concert film wasn't nominated for an Academy Award this year. https://t.co/4wp8uFbW7q

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 小罗伯特-唐尼（Robert Downey Jr）在克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）执导的电影《奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）中饰演了一位爱挑刺的政府官员刘易斯-施特劳斯（Lewis Strauss），一举摘得奥斯卡最佳男配角奖。
item.description:
In a win that pundits had long predicted, Robert Downey Jr. took home the best supporting actor #Oscars statue for playing the prickly government official Lewis Strauss in Christopher Nolan’s "Oppenheimer" https://t.co/ddgoUrrXKk https://t.co/ddgoUrrXKk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在与路易斯安那州立大学（LSU）的 SEC 锦标赛比赛中，身高 6 英尺 7 英寸的头号得分手卡米拉-卡多佐（Kamilla Cardoso）卷入了一场殴斗。
item.description:
No. 1 South Carolina will be without Kamilla Cardoso for its first NCAA women’s tournament game after the 6-foot-7 leading scorer was involved in a tussle in the SEC Championship game against LSU https://t.co/lZpia7lkDv https://t.co/lZpia7lkDv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 吉米-基梅尔（Jimmy Kimmel）把看似裸体的约翰-塞纳（John Cena）哄骗到 #奥斯卡颁奖典礼的舞台上，他只拿着一个信封，信封里藏着他的包裹，里面装着最佳服装设计的结果
item.description:
Jimmy Kimmel coaxed a seemingly nude John Cena onto the #Oscars stage, carrying only an envelope that concealed his package and contained the results of best costume design https://t.co/Ifbpfv02kN https://t.co/Ifbpfv02kN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 2023 年最后一个季度，日本经济按年率计算增长 0.4%，而 2 月中旬公布的初步估计为萎缩 0.4
item.description:
The Japanese economy expanded 0.4% on an annualized basis in the final quarter of 2023, compared with the 0.4% contraction recorded in the preliminary estimate released in mid-February https://t.co/4CwA5bIQ6O https://t.co/4CwA5bIQ6O

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚政府宣布将从 7 月 1 日起取消近 500 项 "扰民 "关税，从而降低从牙刷到过山车和碰碰车等各种产品的进口成本。
item.description:
The Australian government has announced it will abolish close to 500 “nuisance” tariffs from July 1, reducing the cost of importing everything from toothbrushes to roller coasters and bumper cars https://t.co/bVCEbNbvkh https://t.co/bVCEbNbvkh

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 达文-乔伊-伦道夫（Da'Vine Joy Randolph）在#奥斯卡颁奖典礼上获得最佳女配角，为她赢得的赞誉画上了圆满的句号。
item.description:
Da’Vine Joy Randolph’s win for best supporting actress at the #Oscars capped a chorus of acclaim that began for her with last fall’s release of “The Holdovers” and grew with every win she racked up https://t.co/5f0NlN4OQE https://t.co/5f0NlN4OQE

item.title: 拳击手奥斯卡-德拉霍亚（Oscar De La Hoya）在拉斯维加斯再下一城--这一次，他将在拉斯维加斯建造一座豪华住宅，其中包括一个价值 40 万美元的私人洞穴和一个向其职业生涯致敬的房间。
item.description:
Boxer Oscar De La Hoya is going another round with Las Vegas—this time with a tricked out home with features like a $400,000 man cave and a tribute room that pays homage to his career https://t.co/M8dZXLrilM https://t.co/M8dZXLrilM

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 10, 2024

item.title: 十年前，在比弗利伍德花二三十万美元就能买到一栋房子。现在呢？"你不可能以低于300万美元的价格买到任何一条黄金街道上的地皮"。
item.description:
A decade ago, you could buy a house in Beverlywood for $200,000 to $300,000. Now? “You can’t buy just land on any of the prime streets for less than $3 million." https://t.co/2iQv5adKhL https://t.co/2iQv5adKhL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 10, 2024

item.title: 一种新型充电适配器可让福特电动汽车在特斯拉超级充电站充电。@JoannaStern 在 10 个不同地点进行了测试，并与福特首席执行官进行了独家对话。
item.description:
A new charging adapter lets Ford electric vehicles power up at Tesla Supercharger stations. @JoannaStern tested it at 10 different locations and talked exclusively to Ford’s CEO. https://t.co/Cj19WGJEG6 https://t.co/Cj19WGJEG6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 10, 2024

item.title: 多年来，艺术品经销商布伦丹-杜根（Brendan Dugan）一直住在租来的公寓里，这些公寓就像他的画廊一样，简陋而乏味。后来，随着生意蒸蒸日上，一位室内设计师提高了他的设计水平。
item.description:
For years, art dealer Brendan Dugan lived in rented apartments that were a lot like his gallery: scrappy and seat-of-the-pants. Then as business took off, an interior designer raised his game. https://t.co/dYM2oXZDdC https://t.co/dYM2oXZDdC

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 10, 2024

item.title: 您的八人桌，甚至六人桌什么时候能准备好？永无休止听起来如何？餐厅正在减少大型团体用餐。

item.title: 宅在家里的闺蜜们在 TikTok 上上传了大量关于自我保健、烹饪、清洁的视频，以及对传统婚姻的理想化憧憬--少了结婚戒指
item.description:

item.title: 租车意味着每天花费高达 80 或 100 美元（如果你能找到一辆车的话）的日子一去不复返了。"这是旅行中为数不多的能让消费者真正享受到价格优惠的领域之一"。
item.description:
Gone are the days where renting a car meant spending upward of $80 or $100 a day—if you could even find a car. “It's one of the few areas in travel where there's actually a little bit of price relief for the consumer.” https://t.co/0Qzdn6tlOl https://t.co/0Qzdn6tlOl

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 10, 2024
